mapper.select: SELECT nms.* FROM notify_message_setting nms WHERE nms.`CODE`=#{code} and nms.PROJECT_ID = 0

SELECT DISTINCT nssc.ID, nssc.NAME FROM notify_message_setting nms INNER JOIN notify_send_setting nss ON nms.CODE = nss.CODE LEFT JOIN notify_send_setting_category nssc ON nssc.CODE = nss.CATEGORY_CODE WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{notifyType}

SELECT nms.ID, nms.ENV_ID, nms.NOTIFY_TYPE, nms.CODE, nms.SOURCE_ID, nms.SOURCE_LEVEL, nms.EVENT_NAME, nms.SMS_ENABLE, nms.PM_ENABLE, nms.EMAIL_ENABLE, nms.DT_ENABLE, nms.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, hts.message_name AS name, hts.SUBCATEGORY_CODE, htsl.type_code as SENDING_TYPE, htsl.ENABLED_FLAG , nmstu.ID AS NMSTU_ID, nmstu.USER_ID, nmstu.TYPE, nmstu.MESSAGE_SETTING_ID FROM notify_message_setting nms INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON nms.`CODE` =hts.MESSAGE_CODE LEFT JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.temp_server_id=hts.temp_server_id LEFT JOIN notify_message_setting_target nmstu ON nmstu.MESSAGE_SETTING_ID = nms.ID WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{notifyType} AND nms.SOURCE_ID = 0 AND nms.SOURCE_LEVEL = #{sourceLevel} AND hts.ENABLED_FLAG = 1
AND nms.code = #{code}

mapper.delete: DELETE nms, nmstu FROM notify_message_setting nms JOIN notify_message_setting_target nmstu ON nmstu.MESSAGE_SETTING_ID = nms.id WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{type} AND nms.ENV_ID = #{envId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT hts.subcategory_code FROM notify_message_setting nms INNER JOIN hmsg_template_server hts ON nms.CODE = hts.MESSAGE_CODE WHERE nms.NOTIFY_TYPE = #{notifyType}
